Projects
Things I have worked on.

#python #django #open-source
ConnectPie Web App

A Django web app that lets college students create and search class discussion pages where they can post informative notes and links to group chats.

Gathered over 2,000 page views, 350 users in the first 3 days of release.

Backend: Python, Django; Frontend: Bootstrap 4; Deployment: Heroku, PostgreSQL

  View Project   Repository
#jekyll #open-source
Pudina Fresh Jekyll Theme

A Jekyll theme made for personal websites and blogs. Adapted from Pudhina theme by Knhash. Added project page, speed optimizations, updated styles amongst other things.

This site uses this theme.

  Repository   Blog Post
#python #in-progress
Python Ranking Algorithm

A modular object-oriented Python ranking algorithm that aims to deliver speedy ranking based on user set custom preferences.

Initiated the project, currently working in a team of 3 to release the first open source version.

#python #django #open-source
WeatherPie Weather App

A Django weather app equipped with a clothing-suggestion algorithm that delivers a personalized weather forecast and suggests clothing based on the weather.

Backend: Python, Django; Frontend: Bootstrap 4; Deployment: Heroku, PostgreSQL
